sentences.en: A block with a length that can be established by a programmer.
sentences.cn: 其长度可由程序员指定的一种数据块.

sentences.en: An identifier created by the programmer to denote a program, constant, type, variable, procedure, or function.
sentences.cn: 一种由程序员建立的标识符,用以指明程序 、 常数 、 类型 、 变量 、 过程或操作功能.

sentences.en: Assisting the NC programmer to build modelling and prepare NC program.
sentences.cn: 协助数控编程工程师建模和准备程序.

sentences.en: But a programmer worked out how to do this for Microsoft a year ago.
sentences.cn: 不过一名程序员一年前就知道怎么为微软做到这点。

sentences.en: His supervisor recommended that he be promoted to junior programmer.
sentences.cn: 他的上司推荐他晋升为初级程序员.

sentences.en: Mike found a challenging job as a computer programmer.
sentences.cn: 迈克找到一份做计算机程序员的富有挑战性的工作。

sentences.en: Naturally, the contents of these registers have been specified by the programmer for each device.
sentences.cn: 当然, 这些寄存器的内容已由程序员针对每个设备加以规定了.

sentences.en: Right now , serious programmer - type readers are beginning to squirm in their seats.
sentences.cn: 说到这里, 严肃的程序员立即开始局促不安.

sentences.en: The computer programmer botched (up) the job and had to start over.
sentences.cn: 计算机程序设计员把文件弄坏了，只好重做。

sentences.en: The programmer contains only the primary function controls.
sentences.cn: 该种程序器只具有基本功能的控制件.

sentences.en: The programmer forms the heart of the process chromatograph.
sentences.cn: 程序控制器是色谱仪的关键部件.

sentences.en: This element allows the programmer to take a set of nodes, group it by some criteria, and then process each group formed by that selection process.
sentences.cn: 这个元素允许程序员获取一组节点，按某些标准来进行分组，然后处理由那一选择过程组成的每一个组。

sentences.en: This has served me well in my analyst/programmer jobs over the years.
sentences.cn: 这一点对我这些年的分析师/程序员工作很有帮助。

sentences.en: This preserves the logical groupings established by the programmer.
sentences.cn: 这保存了程序员建立的合理分组.

sentences.en: This programmer is designed on a modular basis.
sentences.cn: 这程序器是在标准组件的基础上设计的.

sentences.en: Thus the customer tests and programmer tests are a critical enabling factor.
sentences.cn: 因此客户测试和程序员测试都是有效的评价因素.

sentences.en: To make the computer work at full capacity, the programmer has to think like the machine.
sentences.cn: 为了让计算机充分发挥作用，程序员就得像计算机一样思考。

sentences.en: Trying to do this will help clarify the problem and test the programmer's understanding of it.
sentences.cn: 尽力这样做能够帮助阐明问题且有助于检验程序员对该问题的理解.

sentences.en: Type M programmer is available in four models.
sentences.cn: M型程序单元有四种系列.

words.tran_cn: 设计，规划；编制程序，[计] 程序编制
编程序；安排节目；设计电脑程式
用程序指令；为…制订计划；为…安排节目

phrases.tran_cn: n. 计算机程序设计员

trans.tran_cn: [计] 程序设计者，程序设计器，节目编排者，订计划者
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to write computer programs
